tool.name: MGF Formatter
tool.description: convert peak lists into MGF files formatted for particular downstream applications.

param.name: split_multiple_charge_states
param.label: Split up scans with multiple charge states specified in MGF.

param.name: mgf_format
param.label: MGF Format
param.option: Mascot (default, probably should use msconvert instead)

param.name: itraq_filter
param.label: Preselect iTRAQ reporter ions
param.help: Recent versions of ProteinPilot fail to find the correct report ions, this tool filters out extra peaks in that region to circumvent this bug if this is checked. This is an advanced option and should only be checked if you are certain you want it.
